title: Sid Meier's Civilization III: Complete
notes: Runs fine but fullscreen resolution and bounding of mouse is wonky. Use widescreen ini setting to fix: https://pcgamingwiki.com/wiki/Civilization_III#Widescreen_resolution

title: Sid Meier's Civilization III: Complete
notes: I had to change resolution from 1366x768 to 1280x720 to fix mouse issue

title: Sid Meier's Civilization III: Complete
notes: Few visual and sound glitches, but absolutely playable

title: Sid Meier's Civilization III: Complete
notes: Crashes when trying to start a game (ie exiting menu to game map)

title: Sid Meier's Civilization III: Complete
notes: Can get to main menu with "noesync" launch option, otherwise crashes. Any further keyboard or mouse input crashes the game.

title: Sid Meier's Civilization III: Complete
notes: Go into /Conquests/conquests.ini and add the lines KeepRes=1 and Video Mode=1152

title: Sid Meier's Civilization III: Complete
notes: Game will not load directly from Steam, need to open with Wine directly. Once in game, character models refuse to load and the music and sound effects are glitched.

title: Sid Meier's Civilization III: Complete
notes: Game starts but seems to be a like 640x480 resolution displayed in the upper left corner of the monitor. It's not possible to select anything because the cursor seems to be on another place.

title: Sid Meier's Civilization III: Complete
notes: I had to set KeepRes=1 otherwise the game would crash when I tried to start a new game. I have problems with the sound, the music doesn't play and some of the sound effects keep repeating themselves (but I had problems with the sound running the game under Win 10 too).

title: Sid Meier's Civilization III: Complete
notes: Game run, on start videos run on 1/4 screen, menu is on 3/4 screen, mouse is in wrong position, when you try to start new game, game crashes
Game loads to the menu, but crashes if you try to enter the game part of the game. Interestingly, this game runs fine in vanilla Wine, but fails to run in Proton.
title: Sid Meier's Civilization® III Complete
